channel.title: Coding Help

item.title: Coding Help
item.dc:creator: @shamii shamii
item.description:
@shamii wrote:

Hey I was wondering, does anyone know if this code:

if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158) { npcs[i].StartKilling = person.NPCId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } }
Could work like
if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158) { npcs[i].StartKilling = person.PlayerId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } }
Why: I need a to make a special NPC that kills NPCs . . . Can it work? (I don't want to try the code yet)

Question 2:
Also I was also wondering how to make something Online, as the ways I’m trying are not working for me, perhaps put more detail to it.
I tried making an account on No-Ip, put my IP, downloaded the thingy, tried to put in the Ip/Server/Host in the Set Ip/Server/Host, I would try No-Hamachi but I don’t want to download it. Any Suggestions?

Question 3:
I need help making an quest, or atleast give me a code sketch so I could learn from that. So yeah basically that’s all the questions.

  1. Where do I put quests in?
  2. How do I code my own quests in?

Read full topic
